body:
The new patches are required because of newer vtk@9 versions.
- `vtkUnsignedCharArray.h` must be included explicitly
- through vtk, MPI requires language C, even for CXX projects (https://gitlab.kitware.com/vtk/vtk/-/issues/17734)
Both of these issues affect all previous versions included in spack, but will be fixed in the next Kassiopeia version.
title: [kassiopeia] new version 3.8.0; new variants log4cxx, boost
